1.Title: Reacting Force
1.Description: When successfully Blocking an enemy with Ben's <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the DMG dealt by the blocked enemy is reduced by 30% for 15s.
1.Lore:
"Every action has an equal and opposite reaction. So why do you have to bash things head-on?"
"Looks like your calculations are off."

2.Title: Offense Through Defense
2.Description: When successfully triggering a Block Counter during Ben's <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, inflict an additional 300% of Ben's DEF as DMG.
2.Lore:
Unlike other bear Thirens, Ben remains patient when fighting.
He believes if he keeps his defenses up, he can wait until the enemy reveals their weakness.

3.Title: Careful Accounting
3.Lore: Financial responsibility demands mastering cost-efficiency and utilizing every available resource to enhance both the team and oneself.

4.Title: Agile Adaptation
4.Description: When successfully blocking enemy DMG with Ben's invulnerable effect during his <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the following counter deals 30% more DMG.
4.Lore:
Ben's professional accounting instincts let him adapt dynamically based on the situation.
Whether dealing with accounts or enemies, it's important to achieve the best results at the lowest cost.

5.Title: Meticulous Detail
5.Lore: Ben's keen eye doesn't miss a single error in statements. The same goes for combat, where he gets progressively stronger as he corrects mistakes.

6.Title: Wild Spirit
6.Description: After launching an attack or follow-up attack during Ben's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, Daze inflicted by <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, and <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color> is increased by 20%, lasting 12s.
6.Lore:
Bear Thirens are different from canine Thirens.
They can't be appeased with food alone.
When they lose their temper, the only thing you can do is run for your life...
â€”The discontinued "Be a Good Neighbor! 100 Tips for Getting Along With Thirens"

DescriptionByLevel.1:
Ben's initial ATK increases along with his initial DEF. He gains <color=#2BAD00>40%</color> of his initial DEF as ATK.
When Ben launches a follow-up attack during his <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, all squad members gain a Shield of <color=#2BAD00>15%</color> of his DEF +<color=#2BAD00>100</color>, lasting for 30s.
DescriptionByLevel.2:
Ben's initial ATK increases along with his initial DEF. He gains <color=#2BAD00>46%</color> of his initial DEF as ATK.
When Ben launches a powerful follow-up strike during his <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, all squad members gain a Shield of <color=#2BAD00>17.5%</color> of his DEF +<color=#2BAD00>220</color>, lasting for 30s.
DescriptionByLevel.3:
Ben's initial ATK increases along with his initial DEF. He gains <color=#2BAD00>52%</color> of his initial DEF as ATK.
When Ben launches a powerful follow-up strike during his <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, all squad members gain a Shield of <color=#2BAD00>20%</color> of his DEF +<color=#2BAD00>330</color>, lasting for 30s.

Ben's initial ATK increases along with his initial DEF. He gains <color=#2BAD00>60%</color> of his initial DEF as ATK.
When Ben launches a powerful follow-up strike during his <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, all squad members gain a Shield of <color=#2BAD00>22.5%</color> of his DEF +<color=#2BAD00>460</color>, lasting for 30s.
DescriptionByLevel.5:
Ben's initial ATK increases along with his initial DEF. He gains <color=#2BAD00>66%</color> of his initial DEF as ATK.
When Ben launches a powerful follow-up strike during his <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, all squad members gain a Shield of <color=#2BAD00>25%</color> of his DEF +<color=#2BAD00>500</color>, lasting for 30s.
DescriptionByLevel.6:
Ben's initial ATK increases along with his initial DEF. He gains <color=#2BAD00>72%</color> of his initial DEF as ATK.
When Ben launches a powerful follow-up strike during his <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, all squad members gain a Shield of <color=#2BAD00>27.5%</color> of his DEF +<color=#2BAD00>525</color>, lasting for 30s.
DescriptionByLevel.7:
Ben's initial ATK increases along with his initial DEF. He gains <color=#2BAD00>80%</color> of his initial DEF as ATK.
When Ben launches a powerful follow-up strike during his <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, all squad members gain a Shield of <color=#2BAD00>30%</color> of his DEF +<color=#2BAD00>550</color>, lasting for 30s.

MathSkill.Title: Additional Ability: Contractual Agreement
MathSkill.Description:
When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
While the Shield from <color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: Guardian</color> is in effect, the character's CRIT Rate is increased by 16%.

112100001.Title: Basic Attack: Debt Reconciliation
112100001.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 3 strikes, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

112100002.Title: Special Attack: Fiscal Fist
112100002.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Ben lifts his weapon, blocking the enemy's attack before unleashing a forward strike, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>. Successfully blocking an attack enhances the power of this skill and triggers Block Counter, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Hold <IconMap:Icon_Special> to remain in the Blocking stance.
While in the Blocking stance, Ben gains a Shield that weakens over time.
After leaving the blocking stance, the Shield is removed and recovers over time.
The Shield cannot exceed 16% of Ben's Max HP.
Ben is invulnerable when activating Block.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while launching strikes.

112100003.Title: EX Special Attack: Cashflow Counter
112100003.Description:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Ben lifts his weapon, blocking the enemy's attacks before unleashing a forward strike, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>. Successfully blocking an attack enhances the power of this skill and triggers Block Counter, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Hold <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to remain in the Blocking stance.
While in the Blocking stance, Ben gains a Shield that weakens over time.
After leaving the blocking stance, the Shield is removed and recovers over time.
The Shield cannot exceed 16% of Ben's Max HP.
When this skill is activated, the Shield is restored to its maximum value.
After activating the skill, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> again to follow up with a powerful forward strike, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Ben is invulnerable when activating Block.
Ben is invulnerable while launching strikes.

112100004.Title: Dodge: Missing Invoice
112100004.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

112100005.Title: Dash Attack: Incoming Expense
112100005.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a Dodge to activate:
Strikes enemies in front of him, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

112100006.Title: Dodge Counter: Accounts Settled
112100006.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Strike enemies in front, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

112100007.Title: Chain Attack: Signed and Sealed
112100007.Description:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a powerful strike at enemies in front in a large area, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

112100008.Title: Ultimate: Complete Payback
112100008.Description:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Unleashes a powerful strike at enemies in front in a large area, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
When activating the skill, additionally recover 3 Assist Points.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

112100010.Title: Quick Assist: Joint Account
112100010.Description:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Strikes enemies in front, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable during the attack.

112100011.Title: Defensive Assist: Risk Allocation
112100011.Description:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
This skill excels at parrying enemy attacks and reduces the consumption of <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Points</color> when the character is under intense attacks.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

112100012.Title: Assist Follow-Up: Don't Break Contract
112100012.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Charges and strikes enemies in front, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
